title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, deleting the image file from the outline, and renaming 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg', the original image continues to be displayed.
EB: After importing a new image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, the new image should be displayed.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 2. Delete the image file from the outline. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
